summary: Two turkeys from opposite sides of the tracks must put aside their differences and team up to travel back in time to change the course of history, and get Turkeys off the Thanksgiving menu for good.
cast: Owen Wilson|Woody Harrelson|Amy Poehler|George Takei|Colm Meaney|Keith David|Dan Fogler|Jimmy Hayward|Kaitlyn Maher|Carlos Alazraqui|Jeff Biancalana|Danny Carey|Carlos Ponce|Robert Beltran|Lesley Nicol|Jason Finazzo|Scott Mosier|Lauren Bowles|Dwight Howard|Vincente DiSanti|Jeffrey Fierson|Josh Lawson|David S. Lee|Rik Michul|Alina Phelan|William Morgan Sheppard|Elisa Gabrielli|Shunsuke Okubo
title: Free Birds (Vaya pavos)
